title: Neuralink demo was very cool. Are some things like uploading your mind to a Android body, and getting rid of mental health issues (anxiety, and more) possible if one gets a neuralink chip in the future? Would appreciate your thoughts. - Quora

response.answer_text: If your internal “programs” are deficient,,,uploading won’t correct them,,,that only happens as you interact with reality…make inaccurate choices and reality (c19, fer instance) will slap you upside the head,,,and your “programs” will,,possibly,,,get updated…
